title: Arsenal Captain Granit Xhaka Gets Booed By His Own Fans, He Tells Them To F**k Off
text:
Arsenal Captain Granit Xhaka Gets Booed By His Own Fans, He Tells Them To F**k Off

Arsenal Captain Granit Xhaka Gets Booed By His Own Fans, He Tells Them To F**k Off

Nothing is going right for Arsenal at the moment. After a 0-1 loss against Sheffield United last Monday, they Gunners were again held to a draw by Crystal Palace on matchday 10.

In a decision that didn't go down well with Arsenal fans, Swiss international Granit Xhaka was handed the captain's armband in September. The decision baffled many who believed Xhaka's performances on the pitch don't merit a leadership role.

AFP

And on Sunday, he gave his doubters another reason to have a pop at him - he was substituted in the 61st minute after another lackluster outing, and was booed off by the Emirates crowd. His reaction was very unexpected as he told his own fans to "F**k Off."

It is the last thing you expect from your captain after another poor performance. Granit Xhaka is someone who divides opinion, and has a bi-polar footballing disorder - he can be brilliant on the day, but equally bad on other weeks.

Arsenal squandered a two-goal as Palace hit back to draw 2-2 on Sunday. Sokratis Papastathopoulos gave the hosts an early lead before David Luiz doubled their advantage.

Palace pulled one back through Luka Milivojević (penalty) and then drew level thanks to Jordan Ayew.

Sokratis thought he had scored the winner in the 83rd minute but his goal was disallowed by VAR.

The draw on Sunday meant Arsenal are fifth in the table and have dropped points two weeks running.
